name: Dark Game FAQ's
description: A simple and minimalistic style that's easy on the eyes.

user.name: DeathTBO
user.about:
((((####----My Licence For All Themes---####))))

FreeStyler & FreeStyler team or other style-ripper bots are not allowed use my themes on any website.

Under "No Redistribution" license you need to ask me to use or modify my styles. If you want to install them from userstyles.org and only apply to stylish or stylus extensions feel free to do so without asking.

((((####----My Licence For All Themes---####))))

Thanks DestructiveBurn for the beautiful license terms.

additional_info:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Git repository: https://bitbucket.org/DeathTBO/tbos-stylish

Version 1.06

Updated URL to their GameSpot sub-domain.

Version 1.05

Fixed question/answer text being too dark. Also fixed banner messages being too bright to read.

Version 1.04

Fixed HTTPS links.

Version 1.03

Fixed a few guides having black text (namely Shin Megami Tensei).

Version 1.02

Fixed spoilers.

Version 1.01

Minor fixes.

Version 1.0

Fixed text color, and added !important. Also updated profile page, and button background colors. Dropdown navigation menus are also darker.

discussions.name: Please update for recent site changes
